Description:
ChartException when render chart reportlet through chart toc

Steps to reproduce:
1. Please check out org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine plug-in project .
2. Run testRenderReportlet_toc() method in RenderTaskTest.java.
related codes:
task.setReportlet( charttoc );
task.setRenderOption( htmlRenderOptions );
task.render( );
Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
ChartException.
